footer.description: At MOSIAC, we celebrate Vietnam's rich cultural heritage through authentic fashion and handcrafted goods.

slide1.title: WEAR YOUR STORY, SHINE YOUR GLORY
slide1.description: Discover authentic Vietnamese fashion crafted with passion and tradition, bringing together the best of Vietnam's regional styles.

slide2.title: TRADITION MEETS MODERN ELEGANCE
slide2.description: Each piece tells a story of Vietnam's rich cultural heritage, reimagined for the contemporary world.

craftsmanship.title: Authentic Craftsmanship
craftsmanship.description: Handcrafted by skilled artisans across Vietnam

categories.title: Shop by Category
categories.subtitle: Find your perfect style from our curated collections

regions.title: Explore Regional Collections
regions.subtitle: Discover unique styles from different regions of Vietnam

testimonials.title: What Our Customers Say
testimonials.subtitle: Don't just take our word for it

north.name: Northern Vietnam
north.description: Discover traditional craftsmanship from the mountainous regions of Northern Vietnam.

central.name: Central Vietnam
central.description: Explore the imperial designs inspired by the ancient capital of Hue and central provinces.

south.name: Southern Vietnam
south.description: Experience the vibrant colors and patterns from the Mekong Delta and southern provinces.

special_offer.label: Limited Time Offer
special_offer.title: 30% OFF on All Ao Dai Collection
special_offer.description: Experience the elegance of Vietnam's national dress. Our new collection features both traditional and modern designs suitable for all occasions.

1.text: The quality of the fabrics is exceptional. I love my Ao Dai, it makes me feel connected to Vietnam's beautiful culture even though I'm thousands of miles away.

2.text: Fast shipping and the items look exactly like the photos. The attention to detail in their embroidery work is impressive.

3.text: As a Vietnamese abroad, Mosiac helps me stay connected to my roots. Their modern takes on traditional designs are both authentic and fashionable.

newsletter.title: Join Our Newsletter
newsletter.description: Subscribe to our newsletter to receive special offers, exclusive discounts, and updates on new arrivals.
